subject: Gymnastics
Awards, Decorations and Honors
lead_paragraph: Danell Leyva, winner of the world championship in the parallel bars for the United States on Oct. 16, fled Cuba as a child with his mother and sister.
snippet: Danell Leyva, winner of the world championship in the parallel bars for the United States on Oct. 16, fled Cuba as a child with his mother and sister.
